titleStmt.title: Bibliography of the Kitāb Sībawayhi in electronic form

respStmt.name: Simona Olivieri
respStmt.orgName: Seminar für Semitistik und Arabistik - Freie Universität Berlin

availability.p: Distributed as output of Simona Olivieri's Humboldt research fellowship
availability.licence: This is an open access work licensed under a cc by-nc 4.0 license

sourceDesc.bibl: Sībawayhi, ʻAmr ibn ʻUthmān. 1966. Al-Kitāb. Edited by ʻAbd al-Salām Muḥammad Hārūn. 5 vols. Cairo: Maktabat al-Ḫānǧī.

namespace.name: http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0
namespace.tagUsage: The attribute @xml:id contains information on the Qurʾānic verse quoted in text. The structure of the @xml:id is as follows:Q(Qurʾān)_X(number of the sūra quoted in roman numerals)_N(number of the verse).

The attribute @unit provides information on how the cited range in text is referred to in the bibliography. Thus, "sura:verse" indicated that the first element in "citedRange" is the number of the sūra quoted (in roman numerals) followed by the number of the cited verse. Identifies the chapter's title
